mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO rds_db_instance ( db_instance_id, db_instance_description, region_id, db_instance_status, engine, engine_version, zone_id, db_instance_class, create_time, v_switch_id, tips_level, deletion_protection, lock_mode, pay_type, db_instance_storage_type, vpc_id, connection_mode, connection_string, expire_time, db_instance_memory, resource_group_id, db_instance_net_type, db_instance_type, mutri_orsignle, instance_network_type, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES
( #{item.dbInstanceId}, #{item.dbInstanceDescription}, #{item.regionId}, #{item.dbInstanceStatus}, #{item.engine}, #{item.engineVersion}, #{item.zoneId}, #{item.dbInstanceClass}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.vSwitchId}, #{item.tipsLevel}, #{item.deletionProtection}, #{item.lockMode}, #{item.payType}, #{item.dbInstanceStorageType}, #{item.vpcId}, #{item.connectionMode}, #{item.connectionString}, #{item.expireTime}, #{item.dbInstanceMemory}, #{item.resourceGroupId}, #{item.dbInstanceNetType}, #{item.dbInstanceType}, #{item.mutriORsignle}, #{item.instanceNetworkType}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.updatedAt} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE db_instance_description = VALUES(db_instance_description), region_id = VALUES(region_id), db_instance_status = VALUES(db_instance_status), engine = VALUES(engine), engine_version = VALUES(engine_version), zone_id = VALUES(zone_id), db_instance_class = VALUES(db_instance_class), create_time = VALUES(create_time), v_switch_id = VALUES(v_switch_id), tips_level = VALUES(tips_level), deletion_protection = VALUES(deletion_protection), lock_mode = VALUES(lock_mode), pay_type = VALUES(pay_type), db_instance_storage_type = VALUES(db_instance_storage_type), vpc_id = VALUES(vpc_id), connection_mode = VALUES(connection_mode), connection_string = VALUES(connection_string), expire_time = VALUES(expire_time), db_instance_memory = VALUES(db_instance_memory), resource_group_id = VALUES(resource_group_id), db_instance_net_type = VALUES(db_instance_net_type), db_instance_type = VALUES(db_instance_type), mutri_orsignle = VALUES(mutri_orsignle), instance_network_type = VALUES(instance_network_type), created_at = VALUES(created_at), updated_at = VALUES(updated_at)
